name: Duck Escape (StaszekM)
description:
Duck Escape is an on-line multiplayer 3D game where you must work together, avoid obstacles and nasty humans on your way and collect all 6 coins on each level to win!

Start your game by creating and naming a room, your partner will be able to see it on the rooms list and join! Of course you may play alone, but at some points it might be impossible to win without a help!

When in-game, try to find 6 coins scattered around the map. Avoid the human guard that will try to catch you if you get too close! Sometimes you will need to get to higher spots, so use your friend as a lift!

Controls: WSAD for moving, Left Shift for sprinting, Spacebar for jumping.

Our game uses some free assets from Asset Store (for materials), the rest is our own work!

Credits:

  • Level design, AI and general coding – Michał Duk
  • 3D models, animations, music and SFX – Staszek „Markstein” Markowski https://soundcloud.com/djmarkstein
